Title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
Writer: George Barr McCutcheon (based on the novel "Brewster's Millions"), Da-Mo Peng, Fei Yan
Actors: Teng Shen, Vivian Sung, Lun Ai, Bei-Er Bao
Plot: A pathetic minor league Soccer Goalkeeper was given a task - to spend 1 Billion in thirty days, if successful he will get 30 Billion. However, he's not allowed to tell anyone about the task and he must not own any valuables by end of it.
